About FaithLinks

Daily Lectio Media LLC is dedicated to inspiring daily devotion through FaithLinks™ wristbands and scriptural reflections.

Our mission is to connect people more deeply with the Catholic faith, one daily reflection and meaningful bracelet at a time. We believe in helping people make Scripture a lived, daily experience.

FaithLinks combines the power of the Roman Catholic Lectionary with tangible, wearable reminders—so you can carry the Word of God wherever you go and live the Good News.

Founded by a community of believers committed to evangelization, education, and spiritual growth, FaithLinks strives to foster faith-filled lives through modern means rooted in timeless Catholic tradition.
